00019 #ifndef JT07022008_wrap_events_HPP_DEFINED

00026 #include <boost/bind.hpp>

00028 namespace egui { namespace detail {
00029 
00031 // Uniquely identify window classes
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035 namespace window_id {
00036     struct info_base : typeinfo_holder {
00037         info_base(const std::type_info & val) : typeinfo_holder(val) {}
00038 
00039         virtual bool matches_wnd(const wnd<> & w) const = 0;
00040     };
00041 
00042     template<class window_type> struct info : info_base {
00043         info() : info_base( typeid(window_type) ) {}
00044 
00045         virtual bool matches_wnd(const wnd<> & w) const {
00046             return try_wnd_cast<window_type>(w);
00047         }
00048     };
00049 }
00050 
00052 struct window_type_info {
00053     template<class w> window_type_info( const tag<w> &) : m_window_info(new window_id::info<w> ) {}
00054     window_type_info() : m_window_info(new window_id::info<window_top> ) {}
00055 
00056     bool operator ==(const window_type_info & other) const {
00057         return *m_window_info == *other.m_window_info;
00058     }
00059     bool operator !=(const window_type_info & other) const {
00060         return *m_window_info != *other.m_window_info;
00061     }
00062     bool operator <(const window_type_info & other) const {
00063         return *m_window_info < *other.m_window_info;
00064     }
00065     
00066     bool matches_wnd(const wnd<> & w) const {
00067         return m_window_info->matches_wnd(w);
00068     }
00069 private:
00070     boost::shared_ptr<window_id::info_base> m_window_info;
00071 };
00072 
00074 template<class w> inline window_type_info window_info() { return tag<w>() ; }

00083 // allow calling an event handler
00084 
00085 
00086 struct call_event_handler_base {
00087     virtual ~call_event_handler_base () {}
00088     virtual void call( window_top * w, ::egui::ev::base & event) = 0;
00089 };
00090 typedef boost::shared_ptr<call_event_handler_base> call_event_handler_ptr;
00091 
00092 template<class window, class event_type> struct call_event_handler : call_event_handler_base {
00093     typedef event_handler<event_type> member_type;
00094     typedef typename window::events_type window_events_type;
00095 
00096     typedef member_type window_events_type::* member_data;
00097     member_data m_data;
00098 
00099     call_event_handler (member_data data) : m_data(data) {}
00100 
00101     virtual void call( window_top * w, ::egui::ev::base & event) {
00102         window * real_wnd = dynamic_cast<window*>(w);
00103 
00104         event_type * real_event = dynamic_cast<event_type*>(&event);
00105         if ( !real_event) {
00106             // wrong event passsed to our function!
00107             assert(false);
00108             return;
00109         }
00110 
00111         if ( real_wnd) {
00112             window_events_type & window_events = real_wnd->events;
00113             (window_events.*m_data)( *real_wnd, *real_event);
00114         }
00115         else {
00116             // this can be an event that's been reflected
00117             w->events.on_notify( *w, *real_event);
00118         }
00119     }
00120 };
00121 
00122 template<class window, class window_events, class event_type> inline call_event_handler_ptr event_caller( event_handler<event_type> window_events::* data) {
00123     return call_event_handler_ptr ( new call_event_handler<window,event_type>(data) );
00124 }
00125 
00126 // for an event -> it knows what event handler to call
00127 typedef std::map< typeinfo_holder, call_event_handler_ptr> event_call_coll;
00128 
00129 
00130 
00132 // For a window class, register its default handlers (the virtual functions)
00133 
00134 struct add_default_event_handler_base {
00135     virtual ~add_default_event_handler_base () {}
00136     virtual void add_event_handler(window_top * w) = 0;
00137 };
00138 typedef boost::shared_ptr<add_default_event_handler_base> add_default_event_handler_ptr;
00139 
00140 
00141 template<class window, class event_type> struct add_default_event_handler : add_default_event_handler_base {
00142     typedef event_handler<event_type> member_type;
00143     typedef typename window::events_type window_events_type;
00144 
00145     typedef member_type window_events_type::* member_data;
00146     typedef void (window::*window_member_func)(event_type&);
00147 
00148     member_data m_data;
00149     window_member_func m_func;
00150 
00151     add_default_event_handler(member_data data, window_member_func func) : m_data(data), m_func(func) {}
00152 
00153     virtual void add_event_handler( window_top * w) {
00154         window * real_wnd = dynamic_cast<window*>(w);
00155         if ( !real_wnd) {
00156             // add_default_event_handler contains wrong info!
00157             assert(false);
00158             return;
00159         }
00160 
00161         window_events_type & window_events = real_wnd->events;
00162 
00163         using namespace boost;
00164         function1<void,event_type&> wrap = bind( mem_fn(m_func), real_wnd, _1);
00165         (window_events.*m_data) += wrap;
00166 
00167     }
00168 };
00169 
00170 
00171 template<class window, class event_type, class window_event, class handler> 
00172 inline add_default_event_handler_ptr member_func_as_event_handler( 
00173         void (window::*func)(event_type&), 
00174         handler window_event::* data ) {
00175     return add_default_event_handler_ptr ( new add_default_event_handler<window,event_type>(data, func) );
00176 }

00182 // Know what event to generate when a certain WM_ message occurs
00183 
00184 struct create_event_base {
00185     typedef boost::shared_ptr< ::egui::ev::base > event_ptr;
00186     virtual ~create_event_base() {}
00187     virtual event_ptr create() const = 0;
00188 };
00189 
00190 template<class type> struct create_event : create_event_base {
00191     typedef create_event_base::event_ptr event_ptr;
00192     virtual event_ptr create() const { return event_ptr(new type); }
00193 };
00194 
00195 struct window_events {
00196     typedef boost::shared_ptr<create_event_base> creator;
00197     typedef std::map<long , creator> creator_coll;
00198     typedef std::vector<add_default_event_handler_ptr> event_handler_array;
00199 
00200     creator_coll events;
00201     creator_coll notifications;
00202 
00203     event_handler_array handlers;
00204 };
00205 
00206 template<class e> inline window_events::creator event_info() { 
00207     create_event_base * p = new create_event<e>;
00208     return window_events::creator(p) ; 
00209 }
00210 
00212 // keep thy events
00213 
00214 // manages all events - for all window types
00215 typedef std::map< window_type_info, window_events> window_event_coll;
00216

00218 }}
